title: Google Pixel Slate first look Review | Trusted Reviews
description: * ![]()## Google Pixel Slate – Opening impressionsThe Pixel Slate is a beautiful looking Chrome OS convertible that has thechops to be a fantastic travel companion, student laptop replacement andmobile workstation for basic office busywork.It looks gorgeous and from what I’ve seen has one of the best keyboard coversavailable on a tablet. My only concern is that, like the Pixel Book before it,there won’t be enough apps to justify the top specced version’s price, whichwill put off power and creative users.
